summary: This mod replaces the Dremora from the Dragonborn DLC to look like the Dremora from Morrowind
descriptionHtml:
This mod replaces the Dremora from the Dragonborn DLC to look like the Dremora from Morrowind instead of humans with horns. This only affects the Dremora Butler and the Dremora Merchant.Â 

This mod is 100% finished and I just quickly made it because I thought people would like it.

It does not affect any other Dremora.

If you are using Dremora as a playable race, their horns and hair will be available in chargen.

If you want to use the Morrowind Dremora in your mod, then go for it
author: GendunDrup
